com.ephesoft.gxt.core.server.security.service.impl

Class SSODatabaseAuthorizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.gxt.core.server.security.service.impl.SSODatabaseAuthorizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizationService

    public class SSODatabaseAuthorizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthorizationService
    Provides the implementation of AuthorizationService.

    It implements SSO authentication and authorisation.

    Version:
    1.0 $LastChangedDate:$
    $LastChangedRevision:$
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on 18-Nov-2013
